title: Fifth recall for Tesla Cybertruck within a year, the latest due to rearview display
description: Tesla is recalling over 27,000 Cybertrucks due to delays in rearview camera activation when shifting to reverse, marking the fifth recall since their launch. A free software upgrade addresses the issue, with owner notifications scheduled for November 25. Previous recalls included failures in trim pieces, windshield wipers, and accelerator pedals.
